title: Rolling out BlueMind 4.0: What to Watch Out For
description: BlueMind's version 4.0 incorporates major upgrades in terms of architecture including on the one hand, native Outlook support and on the other hand data replication to prepare the mail system's data for Outlook and other uses (new webmail, mobiles devices in particular).

frontMatter.title: Rolling out BlueMind 4.0: What to Watch Out For
